title: The Infowarrior - Featuring Jason Bermas-4-29-09.Commercial Free
description:
The Info Warrior Show(internet radio) with Jason Bermas April 29th,2009 from prisonplanet.tv - Commercial free. 64Kbps.mp3


Alex Jones anchors the broadcast tonight to report on the "swine flu" pandemic, and the hacking of the Infowars servers.  Luckily, they re-routed and were able to get on the air just in time for the start of the show.  Steve Quale also Joins them to discuss the flu crisis.
